meanings.definition: The belief in three separate gods.
meanings.sent1: Some ancient cultures practiced tritheism, worshipping three different gods.
meanings.sent2: Tritheism is a concept found in certain religions around the world.
meanings.sent3: At the tritheism festival, people celebrated the three gods with colorful dances.
meanings.sent4: The idea of tritheism can be confusing to those who believe in a single deity.
meanings.sent5: In the story, tritheism was depicted as three powerful beings working together for balance.

meanings.definition: The doctrine of the existence of three distinct gods in one Godhead.
meanings.sent1: The tritheism doctrine teaches that three gods are united in one divine entity.
meanings.sent2: Many theologians debate the concept of tritheism within Christianity.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the characters comically argued about the complexities of tritheism.
meanings.sent4: The idea of tritheism can be seen as a puzzle with three pieces forming a whole.
meanings.sent5: The painting symbolized tritheism with three figures merging into a single form.
